text: There are 69 urban settlements in Azerbaijan with the official status of a city (). They are: * Agdam * Agdash * Agjabadi * Agstafa * Agsu * Astara * Babek * Baku (capital) * Balakən * Barda * Beylagan * Bilasuvar * Dashkasan * Davachi * Füzuli * Gədəbəy * Ganja * Goranboy * Goychay * Goygol, formerly Khanlar (Xanlar) * Hajigabul * Imishli * Ismailli * Jabrayil * Julfa * Kalbajar * Khachmaz * Khojavend * Khyrdalan * Kurdamir * Lankaran * Lerik * Masally * Mingacevir * Nakhichevan * Naftalan * Neftchala * Oguz * Ordubad * Qabala * Qakh * Qazakh * Quba * Qubadli * Qusar * Saatly * Sabirabad * Shakhbuz * Shaki * Shamakhy * Shamkir * Sharur * Shirvan * Siazan * Sumqayit * Tərtər * Tovuz * Ujar * Yardimly * Yevlakh * Zaqatala * Zardab == Most populous Azerbaijani cities == List of ten cities, including the capital Baku (2,122,300), with the largest populations, according to the 2012 census. Rank Azerbaijani City Population Image Description 1 Bakı Baku 2,122,300 (2015) Capital and largest city in Azerbaijan. The country's economic powerhouse 2 Gəncə Ganja 328,400 (2015) Second-largest city in Azerbaijan 3 Sumqayıt Sumqayit 298,000 (2015) Third-largest city & Second largest seaport in Azerbaijan 4 Mingəçevir Mingachevir 100,775 (2012) Mingachevir is a city in the north of the country 5 Xırdalan Khirdalan 92,000 (2009) Khirdalan is a suburban city 6 Şirvan Shirvan 85,000 (2012) Located along the Kura river 7 Şəki Shaki 67,000 (2012) Shaki is a city known for its rich history. 8 Yevlax Yevlakh 58,000 (2012) 9 Lənkəran Lankaran 50,000 (2012) Lankaran is a city in the south. ==References== * Azerbaijan Azerbaijan city Azerbaijan Category:Demographics of Azerbaijan
title: List of cities in Azerbaijan
